content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab
Consists of lab at position(x= unknown)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure you have the item to insert in your inventory before attempting to insert it
### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
-  Ensure the pipe connection points are not occupied by other entities before attempting to connect them
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure the burner entity has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure the offshore pump has a connection point to a boiler or other entity that can use the fluid it pumps before attempting to use it
### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure the steam engine has a connection point to a boiler or other entity that can provide the steam it needs before attempting to use it
